40.ara-name: كتاب الإيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The adulterer is not a believer while he is committing adultery, and the thief is not a believer while he is stealing, but there is a chance for repentance; (if he repents, Allah will accept the repentance)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ لاَ يَزْنِي الزَّانِي وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About "The Adulterer Does Not Commit Adultery While He Is A Believer"
